description: Potential threat actor tampering with Sysmon manifest and eventually disabling it Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Sysmon Channel Reference Deletion
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectName:(*WINEVT\\Publishers\\\{5770385f\-c22a\-43e0\-bf4c\-06f5698ffbd9\}* OR *WINEVT\\Channels\\Microsoft\-Windows\-Sysmon\/Operational*) AND ((winlog.event_id:"4657" AND winlog.event_data.ObjectValueName:"Enabled" AND NewValue:"0") OR (winlog.event_id:"4663" AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:"65536")))
